title: FastTaxonomyFacetCounts should use ConjunctionDISI
description: Adrien Grand proposed this patch, so that in sparse cases the facet counting is fast (more in proportion to the size of the intersected set).

comments.author: Michael McCandless
comments.content: Patch from Adrien Grand.  I tested on wikimediumall and the perf change to TermDateFacets looks in the noise.
